detail_desc: Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit top and woven, flared, lined skirt.

Fine-knit jumper and a bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit, patterned cotton blend containing glittery threads. Jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Skirt with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt.

Short cold shoulder dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Flounce with narrow elastication at the top over the sleeves, and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top and ties at the waist. Flounced hem. Unlined.

Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in a patterned stretch cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and short sleeves. Heart-shaped neckline, buttons at the front, a seam at the waist and smocking at the back. Unlined.

Jumper in a soft,fine knit made from a viscose blend with a lace appliqué on the front. Dropped shoulders with frills containing glittery threads that have overlocked edges, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jumper in a soft,fine knit made from a viscose blend with a lace appliqué on the front. Dropped shoulders with frills containing glittery threads that have overlocked edges, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved, jacquard-knit dress in a wool blend containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved, jacquard-knit dress in a wool blend containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved, jacquard-knit dress in a wool blend containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short dress in spotted mesh with beaded and sequined embroidery. Opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined with a short jersey underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine knit with a button at the neck.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine knit with a button at the neck.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine knit with a button at the neck.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine knit with a button at the neck.
Cotton canvas espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.

Calf-length cold shoulder dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a heart-shaped neckline at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Short, flounced sleeves that are elasticated at the top, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with an asymmetric hem and wide flounce. Unlined.

Playsuit in woven fabric with a decorative pompom trim and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated waist and short legs with a lace trim.

Playsuit in woven fabric with a decorative pompom trim and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated waist and short legs with a lace trim.

Playsuit in woven fabric with a decorative pompom trim and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated waist and short legs with a lace trim.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring waist at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring waist at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring waist at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved dress in organic cotton slub jersey with buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt with pockets in the side seams and a scalloped hem.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fitted, padded jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar with integral hood. Zip down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Fitted, padded jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar with integral hood. Zip down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an unlined hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide-fitting top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in airy, patterned crêpe with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at one side and a flounced, wrapover front. Wide flounce at the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in airy, patterned crêpe with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at one side and a flounced, wrapover front. Wide flounce at the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short shorts in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Covered elastication at the waist and scalloped edges with broderie anglaise at the hems. Unlined.

Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with press-studs on the shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and patch pockets with a print motif on the front. Patterned leggings with a wide, foldover waist.

Jacquard-knit jumper with a reversible sequin motif (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a linen and cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam and flounce at the hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed stand-up collar with a text print.
Jumper knitted in marled cotton with twisted seams at the sides and asymmetric ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with terry stripes and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
V-neck top in sweatshirt fabric with flock-print stripes on the sleeves, striped ribbing around the neckline, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside..
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with terry stripes in a relaxed fit with a ribbed neckline.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Chunky-knit jumper in sturdy cotton with ribbed sections around the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a patterned weave with short, wide sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.
